alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 2:13PM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Bear River At Corinne affecting Box Elder County. South Fork of The Ogden River Near Huntsville affecting Weber County. .Snowmelt due to warm temperatures and upstream dam releases will continue to result in increased river flows. Minor flooding is ongoing along the South Fork of the Ogden River near Huntsville, and along the Bear River near Corinne. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Bear River At Corinne. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Minor flooding will occur to agricultural land and associated roads adjacent to the Bear River near the Great Salt Lake. At 16.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur at the Garland City Municipal Wellhouse structure and homes near the Highway 30 crossing. Additionally, moderate flooding will occur to agricultural land associated roads adjacent to the Bear River below Cutler Dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 15.7 feet. - The river has leveled off this afternoon, at approximately 15.7 feet. Moderate flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain between minor and moderate flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 15.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM MDT.
